content: Install TypeScript and related dependencies (@types/node, typescript)
Create tsconfig.json with proper configuration for Node.js project
Create TypeScript interfaces and types for Todo items and MCP schemas
Convert src/index.js to src/index.ts with proper TypeScript typing
Convert test.js to test.ts with proper TypeScript typing
Update package.json scripts and configuration for TypeScript build process
Add build script and output directory configuration
Test the TypeScript build and ensure everything works correctly
Update README.md with TypeScript build instructions and development workflow
